title: Does League work with the latest Windows 10 update?
body:
I wanted to play League recently and it was right after my computer had downloaded a new Windows 10 update. League would not work and I'm pretty sure I have at least the minimum specs. After this I went to properties and ran the compatibility troubleshooter. The compatibility  troubleshooter said it was incompatible.
I run Windows 64-bit fine I used to run League at uncapped but it was usually at around 140 fps.
If anyone could help it would be very much appreciated.

replies.body:
I had the same problem with the new Windows 10 update!

if you right click the League application and select "Test Compatibility" it will run a diagnostic and fix the problem for you!

:)
I'd like to help but I need more details on the actual issue.  What happens exactly, what do you see?  Are you getting any error messages?  At what point is it not working?  Let me know!
When I try to open the kernel I have to run as admin because it does not open normally and when I try to play a game it just freezes and I have to restart my computer because I can't do anything.

Running as admin indicates that there is a security setting issue, so go over our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to permanently allow the patchier to launch.  The freezing issue may be a problem with a windows updates and the xbox game causing a freeze.  Disable the [Xbox Game Bar ](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to get that fixed.  Hope that helps!
I just wanted to say that it now works fine thank you so much now I can enjoy the fun and greatness of league again.
Thank you very much I will see and shut off Xbox game bar I noticed it had started appearing right after a new windows update. I will reply to this comment after I test.
